attributes.action: Remove right to buy on council housing.
attributes.additional_details: The right to buy reduces housing in this country, rather than selling to the individual set up or pass over to housing associations to manage them. We have a housing crisis? No we have a government that supports construction at any cost. Even on green field sites.  Most new housing is sold for over 200,000 pounds this is not affordable for most peope. Save our social housing for future generations.
